problem.markdown:
>>What factors affect how much load a rope or cable can support? Check all that apply.<<
[ ] the length [x] the diameter [ ] the shape [x] the material type
[explanation] The diameter and material type will affect how much load a rope or cable can support. Length and shape do not affect the amount of load a rope or cable can support. [explanation]
